video.title: Agnès de ci de là Varda
video.synopsis: Perky octogenarian film director Agnès Varda documents her world travels, making unexpected connections between the far-flung destinations.

seasons.title: Agnès Varda: From Here to There

episodes.synopsis: Agnès visits Chris Marker for a conversation about art and media. Later, in Portugal, Manoel de Oliveira turns the camera on Agnès.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Agnès visits artist Miquel Barceló, who shows her his unique painting tools, and travels to Brussels for the inauguration of the Magritte Museum.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Agnès heads to Cologne and St. Petersburg, where she talks with the famously guarded Aleksandr Sokurov, then she attends the Art Basel art show.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: In Sète, a Mediterranean resort town, Agnès talks with artist Pierre Soulages on his terrace overlooking the sea. Then she attends the Lyon Biennale.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Agnès visits the Maillol Museum to view a Vanitas exhibit. In Mexico, Agnès converses with filmmaker Carlos Reygadas, who shares his ideas about film.
episodes.title: Episode 5
